name: 2kings
text: so sad

name: milkpants
text: sad-ish

name: vweep
text: But not the saddest thing.

name: afastidioushat
text:
I learned how to play this song and recorded it onto my computer just so I could get the full experience of this strip.

It was mind-blowing.

name: rowboat
text: So, you're just going to tell us about it and not post a link? Some of us are just drummers, you know. We need help with these things.

name: gormster
text: Drummers need help with everything.

name: myrrdisparo
text: Now that's just not true. I just recently learned how to tie my shoes by myself

name: jhunter
text:
being a drummer myself, my natural response to disparaging comments regarding my choice of instrument is rage.

however, I recall vividly the time I tried to twirl my drumstick and it flew out of my hand, and I watched (time always seems slow when you fuck up indescribably badly) as it gracefully arced and stabbed my girlfriend in the eye

name: jhunter
text:
oh hell
I guess what I'm trying to say is "drummers need help with everything"

name: belgand
text: Except, as we see in your story, the ladies. At least there was a lady to get stabbed in the eye. Perhaps there was still a lady there later.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: perhaps she needs help worse than he does.

name: belgand
text: When you play bass there is no lady there. There never will be either.

name: daidai
text:
[IMGS OFF]

This man disagrees with you.

name: belgand
text:
[IMGS OFF]

This man would likewise agree with your position.

It is not a hard-and-fast rule.

name: love_is_so_punk
text: I play bass, drums, and guitar.  That means I get no ladies, I need help with everything, and I have an enormous ego.

name: gunsofray
text: with one eye

name: jhunter
text: one eye, but both her legs

name: aargh
text: Since afastidioushat isnt going to. Also, it is a G, and the B is actually Bdim6

name: rowboat
text: Thanks. It was worth the wait.

name: aargh
text: I tell a lie. Fuckyoufriday is right, it is Bdim7.

name: lotus2700
text: Technically a B half-diminished 7.  Technically.

name: 21echoes
text: no, it's fully diminished. B, D, F, Ab

name: rowboat
text: No, it's ya'll some nerds.

name: aargh
text:
Yeah, well. Shut up.

... hmm, I need to think up a better comeback...

name: rowboat
text: No. That one's good.

name: aargh
text: I'm not sure if half diminished is a real term...

name: scorpio_nadir
text: It's kinda sorta a real term...

name: tragicone
text: that seemed like it toasted a little hard to be the song up there.

name: rowboat
text: Well, I thought the first half was a faithful reproduction while the second was just him....toasting.

name: aargh
text: Who doesn't love toast?

name: rowboat
text: Bread.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Not rowboat. He posts toasted.

name: rowboat
text: LOL WUT

name: greyfield
text: I thought the hard edge made it even cooler. This is what I want played at my funeral march the next time I'm a 1970s British punk rocker.

name: genequagmire
text: Nice.

text: A comment left by saint was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Cyberbob, clintisiceman, boswelljn)

text: What Queen? Which son? Your comment intrigues me.

name: farqussus
text: He brings it out when gets rich, and demands of Cornelius a pleasing dance.

name: laserblade
text: I was just thinkin'.  It's the exact same crown.

name: hadakang
text: this one goes to a real weird place

name: direhaggis
text: Is that the same crown Ray wears during blog entries after sex? That is disturbing yet interesting if so.

name: cdl146
text: I like the B? and G-ish chords used.

name: zedpower
text: Click Bot is hardcore azn gangsta.

name: joeyramoney
text: the B is a B diminished chord with an added sixth. (the song's in the key of A melodic minor, i believe.)

name: joeyramoney
text: clarification- B diminished 7th.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: A comment left by fuckyoufriday was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by dayvancowboy, joeyramoney, Unfun, salvagebar, SatelliteTV)

text: amen to that man.

name: joeyramoney
text: A comment left by joeyramoney was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by straw, apocowarg, saddestking, qleblat, sandswipe, Cracker, Audhumla)

name: astro_zombie
text: I have no idea what you said but I am positive it was excellent.

name: coldfrog
text: now explain G-ish.

name: rowboat
text: Ya'll some nerds.

name: trollcollins
text: . . . said the drummer.

name: rowboat
text: ...to the nerds.

name: fermatprime
text: And the whores like a choir

name: rowboat
text: go "uh!" all night

name: romulus05
text: The G-ish is just a regular ole G major. The B string is just on the fifth instead of the third like most people like to play their G's.

name: salo
text: It's saying stuff like "I bring the pain, white boy".

name: blindspot
text: It's G, but meant to be played in the style of the first Smashing Pumpkins album.

name: radarjammer
text:
The G major triad is G-B-D; this is a plain old G chord it just doesn't look like it because you can fret 0 or 3 on the B string and make a G.

the Bdim takes a long time to explain (see above); but that monster paragraph really just means "if it sounds good us musicians will find a way to explain why we can do it" even though it's not neccasary.

name: hyetal
text:
I... I can tell a guitar apart from a flute.

Usually.

name: farqussus
text: All i got out of that was CHING CHONG WING WONG

name: shutup_shutup
text: Chubbied for awesome musical knowledge, but just to further the point about music being totally convoluted, it technically has to be an Ab instead of a G# since it is the 7th of B.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: touché.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: All played on a Rick by Teodor. Whose Rick?

name: euphemisms
text: this borders my favourite strip in the entire archive. i could not tell you why, but. yes.

name: riazm
text:
I have been known to yell:

YOU STEP TO ME, I BRING THE PAIN.

Before getting my drunken ass kicked to the motherfucking curb.

name: rotavele
text: Is the background for when Phillipe buries click robot drawn differently to the normal style because it took place in his head?  That is kind of my understanding of it after I saw the two panels in the next comic where it shows click robot in the ground and then just on the floor.

name: helloftubby
text: is phillipe on the road to nice pete-ness? it seems he is sorry that he had to kill click robot because he didn't like him. does he feel that he has to kill people he doesn't like and then feel as though he is burying his baby son?

text: "WHITE BOY"

I love you.

name: empy
text: I don't think I'm playing it right. It sounds more like what I could best describe as an angry, yet apathetic, dog.

name: faits
text: Well play it like a king burying his baby son, not like a man doing wrong things to a dog.  SHEESH

name: the_voice
text: Try to play it like Donovan would if he had just watched "Dragonslayer."

text:

name: echidnaboy
text: Charley Smuckles speaks the truth: CGI is one of the leading causes of cancer. And he has surprisingly good taste in stand-up comedy.

name: srennick
text: I'd just like to point out, Téodor has a capo at somewhere around 6 or 7, but there's no direction in the tab to capo anywhere.  So really Chris could have tabbed it relative to the capo, and you're all playing in the wrong key.

name: radarjammer
text: I capoed at 8th and 7th and it as the same feel of course. It's just a little different. I liked the B capo.

name: ketelcat
text:
Philippe is definitely bringing the pain here. Laying it on with a trowel in fact....
Sorry =/

name: i_love_kate
text: This strip is twice as hilarious if you imagine Click Robot speaking with the voice of that robotic greeting card from that episode of Futurama.

name: i_love_kate
text: Imagine it.

text:
the B? chord looks cool; makes me chuckle.

also, i am adding a series of strips to my "automatic 5" club. it now contains: roomba, tab.
